title: Manifestation of the Unmanifested: Shiva Sculptures of Kailash Temple, Ellora ðŸ§˜
description: One of the most remarkable and extensive excavations at Ellora is Cave 16, a scooped out monolithic rock-cut shrine dedicated to Lord Shiva, known as Kailash temple which was built by the Rashtrakutas of Manyakheta.
